statements: SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, email, created_at FROM users ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM users;
SELECT username FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT DISTINCT email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY email ASC;
SELECT user_id, email, created_at FROM users WHERE created_at BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY created_at DESC;

SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT email, username FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT user_id, username FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT users.username, user_roles.role_name FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username = 'alice';
SELECT user_id, role_name FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id WHERE role_name = 'admin';

SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users;

SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT u.username, r.role_name FROM users u JOIN user_role_mapping urm ON u.user_id = urm.user_id JOIN user_roles r ON urm.role_id = r.role_id;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT s.*, u.username FROM sessions s JOIN users u ON s.user_id = u.user_id;

SELECT * FROM users WHERE id > 10 ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT u.username, r.role_name FROM users u INNER JOIN user_roles ur ON u.id = ur.user_id INNER JOIN roles r ON ur.role_id = r.role_id WHERE r.role_name = 'admin';
SELECT u.username, p.permission FROM users u LEFT JOIN user_permissions p ON u.id = p.user_id WHERE u.id = 5;
